string.name: privacy_request_desc
string.Data: "Mi Music needs to collect necessary personal information to provide you with online streaming services. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. You can withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Music in the Settings at any time. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Mi Music. If you don't agree to use the aforementioned services, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you."

resources.string: "Welcome to Mi Music! This app provides the following services: - A local audio player - Online streaming services"

By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Music. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. Mi Music needs to collect necessary personal information to provide you with basic services. Your withdrawal of consent to its Privacy Policy will be held as refusing to accept its services based on collected personal information.

By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Music. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. Your withdrawal of consent to its Privacy Policy will be held as refusing to accept the aforementioned online services based on collected personal information.
